sections.shippingArea: Shipping Area | All regions within Korea (island/mountainous regions excluded for fresh-made food in summer)
sections.shippingFee: Shipping Fee | 3,000 KRW (Free for orders over 50,000 KRW)
sections.shippingPeriod: Shipping Period | 2‚Äì5 business days (excluding weekends & holidays)
sections.shippingNotice: - Delivery may be delayed depending on courier circumstances.
sections.exchange1: - Exchanges/returns due to a change of mind must be requested within 7 days of receipt.
sections.exchange2: - For returns due to customer fault, round-trip shipping fees will be charged.
sections.exchange3: - Exchanges/returns are not allowed for damaged packaging, used products, or overdue requests.
